revisions.*: Because "rvslots" was not specified, a legacy format has been used for the output. This format is deprecated, and in the future the new format will always be used.

[[Category:Atlas]][[Category:Dungeons]]

__TOC__

==Notes==
* The entrance is located deep within [[Hythloth]]. To enter the dungeon, you must utter the words "Wis Kal Por Uus". You may also be able to find a rune marked inside the doors at your local rune library.
* Creatures may often be very close to the entrance - tread carefully!
* To teleport back to Hythloth, walk over the flames to the West.

==Level 1==
===Monsters===
* Balron, daemon, shadow wyrm, dragon, evil mage, lich, vampires, lich lord
